title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Bright, radiant ruby red. On the nose fruity, blackberries and cassis, plus fine rosehip, also of mint and liquorice, inviting. The palate is rich, with clear bright fruit and grippy tannins, showing fine earthy undertones, savoury, minimal drying in the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Raspberries, currants, lemon blossom, mandarin peel, wild thyme and marjoram. Medium to full bodied, well extracted, biting tannins and a tight finale which needs time to come out. Better from 2024.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Subtle aromas of scorched earth, forest floor and mature berries mingle with a eucalyptus note. The full-bodied palate features cherry marinated in spirits, prune, roasted coffee bean and licorice framed in close-grained tannins. You'll also notice the warmth of alcohol on the close. While it reflects the heat of the vintage, it also shows polish and restraint. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Leuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase nach reifen Kirschen, reifen Erdbeeren, leichte Fasswürze, im Nachhall balsamische Komponenten. Am Gaumen strahlend und mit klarer Frucht, zieht sich im hinteren Bereich dann allerdings stark zusammen.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Intriguing and decidedly structured in the primary profile showing notes of red flowers, mandarin peel and green tea leaves. Medium bodied, a simple structure, lightly extracted tannins and a finale which lacks a bit of balance at the moment. Better from 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Camphor, rose and new leather aromas form the nose along with a whiff of baking spice on this vibrant red. Polished and taut, the savory palate offers spiced cranberry, red cherry and star anise before finishing on a coffee note. Lithe, refined tannins and fresh acidity provide balanced support. Drink 2022–2028. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Bright ruby red. Present on the nose, ripe raspberries and rich strawberries, a touch of icing sugar, vanilla. Opens smoothly on the palate, with fine course, certain juiciness, compact finish.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Classic and rich in style showing its true essence in the scents of cherries, red prunes, white almonds, lime and acacia. Feminine and captivating showing a precise, pure profile that immediately hits the consumer. Medium to full bodied, velvety tannins which make up the main skeleton of the matrix and a pure expression of national beauty in the finale. Love at first sight but will give more over time. Better from 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Lacking in colour but powerful in essence this young Brunello shows notes of orange juice, lime, red prunes and cinnamon. Full bodied, juicy, soft tannins and a balanced finale. Better from 2021.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Scents of sour cherries, orange pulp and jasmine flowers. Medium to full bodied, light tannins and an energetic, balanced finale.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Underbrush, star anise and menthol aromas form the nose. The taut light-bodied palate offers pomegranate, orange zest and a hint of dark spice. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Bright, rich ruby. In the nose of raspberries, wild strawberries, underlaid by delicate savouriness. At the palate of ripe red fruit, certain drive, spreads with hearty tannin, on the finish delicate of-drying.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: (2020) I haven't tasted Banfi's Brunello since the 2000 vintage, an excellent wine that I scored 92. This comes from an official 'five star' vintage, and Banfi predict it will cellar well for 20 to 30 years. It is 100% Sangiovese, the vineyard hand-harvested three or four times to select the ripest fruit, and aged only in large format oak barrels. There's an earthy, dried blood tone to the colour, and a spicy, Sandalwood and cedar component on the nose, some Chinese dried plums and a fresh cherry note. In the mouth the sweet ripeness of the fruit is delicious, a succulent fleshy plum note, but the grip, the spice, and the tight tannin framework does indeed suggest significant ageability. Many stockists are selling by the six-bottle case at time of review, but more will be moving on to this vintage.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Elegantes, dezentes Bukett mit Noten von reifer Sauerkirsche, Brombeere und etwas Veilchen. Am Gaumen sanfter Auftakt, dann tragende, prägnante Säure, spürbares Tannin. Guter Speisenbegleiter, der noch reifen kann. Dominik Vombach

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Aromas of wild berry, fragrant purple flower and a whiff of culinary spice come together on this sleek red. On the vibrant light-bodied palate, lithe tannins lightly support blackberry, cranberry and ground clove. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: The nose is fruity, gourmand, racy and offers a slight fleshiness. It reveals notes of wild strawberry, crushed raspberry and small notes of boysenberry / blueberry, ripe red berries associated with slight touches of liquorice, colas as well as slight hints of chocolate and sweet tobacco. The palate is fruity, mineral, fresh, well-balanced, elegant and offers a slight acid frame, a slight juiciness, a slight tension / straightness, a good structure as well as a beautiful definition. On the palate this wine expresses notes of raspberry, crushed ripe cherry, crushed blackberry and small notes of cassis combined with touches of black olive, sweet tobacco, toasted oak as well as a very discreet hint of almond and wood. Good length.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Forest floor, wild berry, coffee and toasted oak aromas come together on this. The medium-bodied palate is on the lean side, offering sour cherry, tobacco leaf, espresso and a saline note alongside lithe tannins. Drink 2020–2028.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Shy aromas suggesting ripe black-skinned fruit, espresso and a whiff of dark spice emerge in the glass. The medium-bodied palate offers dried black cherry, mocha and grilled sage alongside fresh acidity and taut tightly knit tannins. Drink after 2019.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: (Sangiovese): mittleres Granat, oranger Rand. Tiefe, feinduftige und florale Nase, man sucht und man findet, dunkle und rote Beeren, Dörrobst, Tabak, würzige Komponenten. Sehr gute Komplexität. Am Gaumen fast harmlos im Auftakt, dann packen die Gerbstoffe zu, diese sind reif und fein gewoben, die Frucht eher rot gefärbt, wird von Marzipan begleitet. Sehr frische Säure, kräftiger Körper, das ist ein Mund voll Wein. Im Abgang von guter Länge, endet feinwürzig. Ein guter Brunello, kräftig und doch sehr elegant und ausgewogen. Jetzt bis 2032, 18 vvPunkte, (90/100). Erhältlich für CHF 36.00 bei Bindella

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Fairly intense garnet with bricking. Splendid nose of coffee, toasted chestnut, mild spices and ripe sour cherry undertones. Robust, rich, nervy palate. Superb nascent complexity. Spicy, lively with a fine mineral dimension, nearly soft tannins and great persistency.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: This opens with aromas that recall leafy underbrush, grilled porcini and mature dark-skinned fruit. The taut palate offers dried black cherry, coffee, sage and anise alongside tightly wound tannins that give it a firm finish.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: The nose is aromatic, relatively intense and offers a small elegance. It reveals notes of blackberry, dried flowers and tobacco associated with a few spicy notes. The palate is fruity, mineral, balanced, smooth, harmonious, quite fleshy and provides a certain density and a certain elegance. In the mouth this wine expresses notes of cherry and black cherry combined with slight notes of raspberry, fine notes of blackberry, saline minerality as well as fine notes of spice and toasted oaky notes on the finish. Tannins are quite present. Good length and persistence.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Clear garnet with bricking. Fairly subdued nose with mild spice, garrigue, elegant exotic wood and stone fruits in the background. Silky, rich and tense presence on the palate. Great finesse, clear-cut, pure, albeit shy aromas. Closely-integrated, fine tannins.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Blackberry and vanilla in the nose, on the palate more sour  cherry in a long finish. Complex, balanced, very good quality.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Geschmeidige Nase mit Butterkeks und feinfruchtigen Waldbeeren, kühle Würze, hat etwas schön Wildes.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Good but little bit strong yet

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Excellent wine Italy trip

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Acidity based BDM standard. Raspberry and cherry shows somewhat vivacious performance. Medium body and medium tannin. It is a moderate easy-going wine. A good choice for the entry of BDMs.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: It's brand carries it a bit further than the rating says but still very good.  Good structure and length. Better with time out of the bottle. Pepper.

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Great!

title: Castello Banfi Brunello di Montalcino DOCG
content: Depth but not heavy; delicate to bold finish; nose of earth, wood; palate: pepper/currant, dried cherry, little tart; lingering astringent tannin but delicate enough. Refined Italian

Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Bright, rich ruby red. On the nose, fine hints of malt and liquorice, freshly baked brown bread, fragrant, also dried roses and raspberry cordial, a touch of truffle. Shows pithy and clear on the palate, with bright fruit and tight, juicy tannins, fine cherry, delicate drying on the finish, promising.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Strawberries, red prunes, mixed mandarins, red flowers, white flowers and sweet almonds describe the primary scene of this solid, muscular Brunello. Full bodied, velvety tannins of optimum workmanship and a structured finale which articulates itself from the central palate onwards in search of a notable lengthening. Better from 2024.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: This has balsamic aromas recalling camphor that mingle with cedar, scorched earth and leather. The palate is rather shy in terms of fruit richness, recalling licorice, powdered sage and dried cherry alongside the heat of evident alcohol before a bitter close. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Dunkel leuchtendes Rubinrot. Satte Lederwürze mit balsamischen Komponenten, Tabak, Cassis, Brombeeren. Am Gaumen sehr geschliffen mit engem Tannin, kraftvoll, kommt in vielen Schichten, im Nachklang dann leider etwas auszehrend.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Interessante Noten von Cassis und Sandelholz, auch feine Gewürznoten; der Auftakt rassig, engmaschige Tannine, gut eingebundene Säure, schöne Länge auf Noten von Steinobst und Leder. Tadellose Machart.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Intriguing on the nose showing green hints reminiscent of tea leaves, nepetella, cintronella and wild thyme. Medium to full bodied, well distended tannins and a classic finale, radiant and essential. Better from 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Rose, exotic spice, menthol and coffee-bean aromas mingle together in the glass. The full-bodied, tight palate offers sour cherry, French oak, espresso and the warmth of alcohol alongside close-grained, assertive tannins that grip the finish. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Dark ruby red with a tendency to garnet. Noble wood on the nose, ripe cranberries and a breath of dried rose leaf, full cherries on the finish. Full and balanced on the palate, pulls itself along with a savoury core, with drive and long finish.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Vielschichtig fruchtiger Wein mit Aromen von Himbeeren, Pilzen und Leder; besitzt geschliffene Tannine, endet in einem frischen Pflaumenfinale. Solide.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: One of its kind showing off a noble energy made up of hints both wild and attractive which are reminiscent of blackcurrants, raspberries, pomegranate, acacia flowers, and rhubarb. Ginseng roots meet in the background with notes of wild myrtle and camphor. Medium to full bodied, slightly rigid tannins at the moment which give birth to energy and structure, a tight and vibrant finale. Better from 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: This full-bodied red has aromas of French oak, camphor and a whiff of roasted coffee bean. Tightly knit and youthfully austere, the palate offers sour cherry, orange zest, licorice and a note of dried sage alongside firm, close-grained tannins that grip the close. Drink 2023–2030. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Rich, dark ruby with garnet. Dried violets on the nose, peppermint, ripe blackberries and chocolate. On the palate then very grippy with plenty of tannin, tightly woven, develops well, should still lie, with emphasis.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Sentori pieni e vivi di prugna nera, mora e mandorle tritate. Corpo medio-pieno, tannino morbido ed un finale secco e di buona persistenza. Bevi ora.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Preciso e di estrema purità nasale questo rosso mostra note di lavanda, fiori di agapanto, ribes e lamponi. Bella la percezione agrumata che si manifesta con cedro e succo di limone. Corpo pieno, tannini di natura morbida e vellutata ed un finale compatto e solido nell'impostazione persistente ed autentica. Meglio dal 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: (2020) From the vineyards that surround the Poggio alle Mura castle, this spent two years in French oak, plus a further three in bottle. It has a deep red colour, but a little paleness on the rim, then a deep and quite curranty aroma, some volatile lift, and cherry fruit beneath. In the mouth it is smooth and sweetly-fruited, there is liquorice, and again that intense raisined quality. Taut and juicy, the finish has a purity, with oak subsumed by the sweet fruit and elegance of the tannins and acidity.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Verführerische Himbeer-Beerenaromatik; linearer Bau, die Säure und die Tannine in Balance, der Abgang geschliffen und fruchtig. Perfekter Begleiter für Fleischgerichte.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Black-skinned fruit, fragrant purple-flower and baking-spice aromas mingle with a whiff of tilled soil. It's elegantly structured with youthful tension, delivering juicy Morello cherry, spiced plum, star anise and tobacco alongside fine-grained tannins and bright acidity. Drink 2021–2029. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Sattes, kraftvolles Rubinrot. In der Nase leichter Anflug von Eukalyptus und feiner Minze, dann würzige Töne, im Nachhall satt nach Cassis. Breitet sich am Gaumen weit aus, spannt sich schön über die Zunge mit festem Druck, lebhaft, im Abgang dann etwas auszehrend.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: The nose is aromatic, elegant and mineral. The wine needs to be put in carafe. It reveals notes of cassis, blackberry, wild strawberry and small berries associated with touches of gray pepper, undergrowth, flowers, black olive as well as subtle hints of Zan, sweet spices, blond tobacco and a very discreet hint of almond (in the background). The palate is fruity, mineral, juicy and offers freshness, a beautiful acid frame, a good definition, finesse as well as roundness. On the palate this wine expresses notes of juicy raspberry, wild strawberry and small notes of ripe redcurrants, ripe cassis combined with hints of Zan, blond tobacco, olive tree as well as discreet hints of spices, almonds, toasted oak and an imperceptible undergrowth. Tannins are a bit firm. Good length. There are a hint of chocolate and a hint of caramelization on the finish / persistence. The finish is very slightly grainy and juicy.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Aromas of ripe plum, blue flower and a whiff of baking spice unfold in the glass. The vibrant elegant palate offers dried Marasca cherry, cranberry, star anise and a hint of toast while fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity provide support. Drink 2021–2028.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Frisches Beerenbouquet, Sandelholz- und Ledernoten; geschmeidiger Auftakt, kernig, die Tannine und die Säure gut ausbalanziert, solides Fruchtfinale, etwas holzbetont. Für Freunde eines modernen Brunello-Stils.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Intensives, leuchtendes Rubingranat. Einladende und offene Nase mit ausgeprägten Noten nach Granatapfel, süßen Himbeeren und etwas Gewürznelken. Kerniges, dichtes Tannin, zeigt schöne Zwetschkenfrucht, öffnet sich mit gutem Druck, im Finale etwas trocknend.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Plummy aromas mix in the glass with whiffs of pressed blue flower, vanilla and mocha. The taut structured palate offers dried black cherry, coconut, licorice, espresso and black pepper while firm fine-grained tannins provide the framework. A note of pipe tobacco closes the tight finish. Give it a few more years to unwind and fully develop. Drink 2020–2027.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Excellent wine. Unfortunately thinner than ideal, due to age; without this it would easily be a 5/5.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura
content: Tiefes Rubinrot mit granatrotem Rand. Rumtopf, Pflaume, Bourbonvanille und Eiche. Sehr harmonisches Mundgefühl, dezente, fruchtige Säure, sehr feinkörniges Tanin. 17 Punkte

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Dark ruby with a delicately lightening core. On the nose a bit restrained at the beginning, after some time then very spicy, with fine oak, sealing wax, blackberries and cassis, in the echo the addition of fine earthy tones. The palate is deep in structure, with rich tannins, plus savoury red berryish tones, slightly drying, currently still very young, will benefit from further ageing.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Potente ed estremamente complesso al naso alterna note di amarene, fragoline di bosco, fiori di limone, fiori di acacia, buccia di lime e bosso. Corpo pieno, tannini vellutati di splendida grana fine ed un finale leggiadro e sapido che in modo centrato regala grandi emozioni. Un grande Summus nel millesimo 2018.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Tönt einnehmend nach Schwarzkirschen und Schokolade, auch Sandelholznoten; der Auftakt kraftvoll, die Tannine robust, feinherb auf Noten von dunklen Waldfrüchten das Finish. Überzeugt mit seiner charaktervollen Machart.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Molto floreale regala piacevolezza con note di lavanda, fiori di ibisco ed agapanto. Al palato si presenta speziato e ricco di pepe nero e bacche di ginepro. Corpo medio-pieno, tannini di vibrante tensione ed un finale teso e di lunga persistenza. Meglio dal 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Dolce e speziato al naso coniuga con potenza amarene, chiodi di garofano e cannella in stecca . Corpo medio-pieno, tannini dolci ben fusi ed un finale preciso di media-lunga tensione meglio dal 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Complesso ma ben armonico nel profumo, offre note di canfora, fiori di arancio, foglie di tè verde e mallo di noce. All'assaggio tante mandorle bianche in sottofondo. Corpo medio-pieno, tannini morbidi ed un finale di notevole tensione. Eccezionale lavoro nella difficile annata.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Aromas of dark skinned berry, cedar and cassis mingle with whiffs of violet and French oak. On the elegant, structured palate, tight, fine-grained tannins support flavors of black cherry, red currant, espresso and tobacco. Fresh acidity keeps it balanced. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Deep dark, rich ruby with garnet. Delicately smoky nose, graphite, minimal spice, ripe wild berries. On the palate good grip, builds up nicely, many layers, compact, short on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Leuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase viel schwarze Johannisbeeren, leichte Pfefferwürze, im Nachhall dann Amarena. Am Gaumen vielschichtig und körperreich, breitet sich weit aus und wirkt sehr satt, im zweiten Bereich dann zupackendes und rauhes Tannin, trockenes Finale.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: A blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah, this vibrant red has alluring aromas of plum, blackberry, purple flower, espresso and a whiff of exotic spice. The elegant, structured palate delivers black cherry, black currant, pipe tobacco, vanilla and licorice alongside fresh acidity while firm, fine grained tannins lend a polished texture. Drink 2018–2028.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Subtle aromas of chocolate, espresso and ripe bluish-black fruit lead the nose of this robust blend ofCabernet SauvignonSyrah andSangiovese. The concentrated palate delivers ripe plum, dried black cherries, clove and black pepper alongside bracing tannins. You'll also notice the heat of alcohol on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Einer der wenigen Supertoskaner, die es aus Montalcino in die Spitzenriege geschafft haben: Die Rebberge liegen in den wärmeren Lagen des Anbaugebietes und demonstrieren, dass auch die

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Wird aus Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon und Syrah gekeltert und 17 Monate in Barriques ausgebaut: Würzige Nase von Rumtopf, Lakritze und Gewürzen, auch Noten von Vanille und Holz; am Gaumen füllig, fest mit kernigem Tannin, feine Herbe in Finale, auch gute Säure. Solide Machart, wenn auch noch etwas kantig.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Summus is a delicious blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah that opens with a round and soft bouquet with plush layers of blackberry, chocolate, cherry liqueur, toasted almond, tobacco and leather. There's a slight bite to the tannins that will set this wine forward many years in terms of its aging potential. Drink after 2018.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Summus is a beautiful Tuscan blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah that opens with a drying, dusty mineral feel followed by loads of plump, ripe fruit. Great care was executed in the clonal selection of Sangiovese and that variety delivers the wine's distinctive territoriality.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: The 2006 vintage presents elegant, refined tones and this blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah does just that. There's a nice fullness to the wine that is reflected in the integration of its aromatic elements. Chocolate, red cherry and exotic spice linger long on the palate.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Summus (a blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet and Syrah) is a brawny, powerful wine with meaty extraction and layered aromas of plum, blackberry and cherry. These fruity notes are framed by elegant mineral tones.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Berry jam, open oak and earth aromas come together after airing, and in the mouth there's blackberry, dark plum and chocolate flavors. The finish is a bit reserved and toasty, and while the wine may not deliver the most complex secondary characteristics, it's on the money and exceedingly likable. A blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Dark violet in color, and thick like syrup. Aromas of blueberries, graham cracker and Coca-Cola seem sweet, while the palate is soft and one-dimensional, offering mostly muscular berry fruit but not much complexity or balancing characteristics. Has its merits, but given its track record it seems off form.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: This very internationally-styled blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Syrah displays dense fruit, brisk acidity and the lavish use of oak. Extremely dark aromas and flavors predominate, with firm black plum, tobacco and earth elements. The long and even finish of this weighty offering shows tart blackberry flavors and full tannins.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: Luscious and bold, with a round, masculine bouquet of blackberry, bitter chocolate and a whiff of coconut. The palate sports perfect harmony; it's full of cola, cherry, plum and espresso. The finish is tight and right on the money. Lovely stuff from a fine vintage; a wine made in the rich, sweet, modern style. The blend is Sangiovese, Cabernet and Syrah.

title: Castello Banfi Summus Sant'Antimo
content: 86 Punkte. Präsentierte sich insgesamt bis auf die Tanine schwach. Nicht nochmal

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Bright ruby with brightening garnet rim. Intense nose with beautiful matured notes of sour cherries, rum-steeped fruit and prunes, some liquorice in the background. Hearty, dense tannin, unfolds in many layers, ripe fruit also on the palate, fine texture on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Forest floor, camphor, blue flower and pipe tobacco aromas take shape in the glass. Full-bodied and brawny, the concentrated palate exhibits raisin, prune, licorice and the heat of evident alcohol alongside densely woven, velvety tannins. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Balsamic on the first impact showing notes of red prunes, un-ripe wild strawberries, eucapytus and wild thyme. Medium to full bodied, light tannins of good quality and a slightly staid finale that will come out over time. Better from 2024.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Forest-floor, new leather and pipe-tobacco aromas mingle with notes of violet and coffee bean. Elegantly structured, the taut, savory palate doles out ripe black cherry, blackberry jam, licorice and a hint of espresso while polished, fine-grained tannins and tangy acidity provide age-worthy support. It's still youthfully austere so give it a few more years to come around. Drink 2024–2036. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Aromas of forest floor, pipe tobacco, wild berry and crushed botanical herb shape the nose. Radiant and all about finesse, the vibrant palate offers red cherry, cranberry, coffee bean and star anise before closing on a hint of graphite. It's still youthfully austere and needs time to fully develop. Drink 2025–2033. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Elegant dark ruby. On the nose slightly earthy tone, black leather, dominant savouriness, barrel, on the finish black currants, blackberries and fruit tea. On the palate still very young, shows currently still open, gripping tannin, but also juice and fruit in the background, should absolutely still grow up, will assemble well.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Elegant and from a pronounced profile offers scents of red prunes, chopped white almonds, lemon rind, mandarin juice, wild thyme and citronella. Medium bodied, velvety tannins well drawn out and perfectly integrated in the matrix and a long finale with a modern, sliding setting, it certainly won’t go unnoticed, a wine not to miss. Better from 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Rich, flint ruby. Compact, deep nose, shows notes of licorice, some pepper, then blackberries and plums, balsamic. Gripping tannin in many layers, shows itself in the course very pithy and gripping, good drive on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Wow, complesso nei sentori e nel profilo sensoriale dispensa lentamente la sua ricchezza con note di prugne nere, more, incenso ed asfalto caldo. Corpo pieno, tannini perfettamente maturi di impostazione solida e al momento ancora rigida ed un finale bello nell'essenza e nalla piacevolezza. Meglio dal 2021 in poi quando la lenta ossigenazione avrà ammorbidito la parte polifenolica e tannica.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Forest floor, grilled herb and pipe-tobacco aromas lead the way on this firmly structured wine. The full-bodied palate offers dried cherry, steeped prune, orange zest and licorice set against tightly knit close-grained tannins. Drink 2022–2032.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Opulente Waldfruchtaromen, auch Noten von Lakritze und Zimt; der Ansatz saftig, voll, weiche, abgerundete Gerbstoffe, reifes Fruchtfinale, das Holz spürbar. Sollte mit der Reife noch an Schmelz gewinnen.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Intense garnet with bricking. The nose is racy and not very open with mild spices and exotic wood, fine roasted coffee, hay and ripe plum. Magnificent velvety, refined, profound presence on the palate. Aroma has yet to awaken. Gold standard. Will go far.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: This slowly opens in the glass to reveal aromas of espresso, dark spice, menthol and ripe black-skinned fruit. On the firmly structured palate, integrated, close-grained tannins frame mature black cherry, licorice, clove and grilled herb. Give it time to unwind and fully develop. Drink 2022–2035.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: The nose is elegant, intense, powerful, incisive and elegant. It reveals notes of truffle, mushroom and slight notes of dried leaves associated with a few notes of red fruit in the background. The palate is fruity, mineral, silky, balanced and offers freshness, a nice sweetness, harmony and tension. In the mouth this wine expresses notes of blackberry and cherry jam associated with touches of cassis, black cherry skin, cherry, black olive, laurel, spices and slight notes of licorice, chocolate, toasted notes and pepper. Tannins are fine. Good length.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Leuchtendes, sattes Rubin-Granat. Intensive Nase mit satter Kirschfrucht, im Hintergrund nach Zwetschken, unterlegt von einem feinem Gewürzteppich. Am Gaumen viel dichtes und zupackendes Tannin, baut sich in vielen Schichten auf, im Finale salzig und fester Druck.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: The nose is aromatic and quite elegant. It reveals notes of ripe black fruits and slight notes of cooked fruit associated with a small note of leather, licorice, spices and a touch of butter. The palate is mineral, ample, well-structured, complex and dense. In the mouth it expresses notes of ripe fruit, cherry, plum and blueberry associated with cassis and slight notes of spices (in the background) and a touch of licorice on the finish. There is also a slight note of salinity in the mouth. Tannins are fine and well-integrated. Good length.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Selektion einer Lage auf einer Hügelspitze, in perfekter Position, um komplett auszureifen: Verführerische Kirsch-Tabakaromatik, im Mund rassig, füllig, komplex, das Finale auf Maraschino-Krischnoten und Nougat. Natürlich - durch den Ausbau in Barriques - derzeit vom Holz dominiert, etwas atypisch und von moderner Machart, aber ein einladender Tropfen, der nicht nur den Amerikanern gefallen dürfte. Nicht ganz auf dem Niveau: Der Poggio alle Mura Riserva 2007 von Banfi.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: A real thoroughbred. The color is an intense ruby-garnet with few concessions. The aroma is outstanding with orange peel, spice, prunes, an intense floral component of violets, bergamot, tamarind, tobacco and a light, refreshing, balsamic greenish nuance. The attack is wonderful, dense and elegant, with excellent tannins that are elegant and settled. The acidity is discreet yet present, while the finish its perfect thanks to its persistence and intensity. The retro-nasal return is also excellent, impeccably defined between its floral and dark spice components.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: This could very well be the best Poggio all'Oro of all time. It reaped the benefits of new fermentation technology used in the cellar. The nice, intense ruby color is not dark and holds up well on the edge. The aroma is broad with intense fruity scents, various ripening stages of cherry and morello cherry, and the fruity streak is enhanced by ripe blackberry, while the innovative use of wood is discreetly evident in the slightly smoky tone. The fresh, balsamic vein and yellow peach indicate a hot year. The flavor is magnificent and always elegant, part of this wine's DNA. The delicate and compact tannins are excellent, youthful yet well-behaved. The body is compact and acidity nice, all contributing to an excellent, fleshy and persistent finish.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: This vintage truly reaps the benefits of aging. The rains of early September had a lot of producers worried but those who were brave enough to delay their harvest until the wonderful weather in October obtained great results. Banfi waited and the results were excellent. The color is a lovely ruby with intense garnet nuances, while the aroma is sharp, broad and full, centered on scents that are still fruity with citrus accents of bergamot, tamarind and cherry, with a light spiciness from the wood and sweet Ecuadorian chocolate. There is also some mulberry and tobacco. The flavors is, as always, intense with a nice acidity which here is more suppressed than the 1993, while the tannins are delicate, settled and elegant. Great finesse and taste progression with a finish that is not muscular but very persistent.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: In my view this very young Brunello that comes out this year shows how much Banfi believes in research. Dealing with such a hot year was no easy task but Banfi came up with the goods. The classic ruby color is nicely concentrated and compact. The aroma is broad, clean and intense with a distinct scent of yellow peach along with red fruit and blackberry, slightly jammy and under spirits, without being sickly sweet. A slight vein of bramble and an intriguing green nuance complete the picture. The taste is quite bold and alcoholic, but in a good way. The young and intense tannins are still rampant but of excellent quality, while the acidity is surprising for such a hot year. The progression is rich, intense and muscular and it is in the finish that the full boldness of the wine is felt, even if it could be a little more elegant. Young.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Its intense garnet color has a consistent edge while the aroma holds up with nice evolved notes of leather, damp underbrush, a touch if licorice and slightly ethereal tones. There are also the classic scents of dried prunes and bergamot. As always the taste is nicely held up and articulated with tannins that are present but composed and not aggressive. The attack is interesting, quite dense, distinct with its touch of sapidity that allows for a progression that is very elegant and still whole. In the finish there is a return of licorice and bergamot, a nice taste-aroma combination.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: The color is an orange-ruby with small garnet nuances, very minimal considering its age. The aroma is decidedly complex with evolve scents of tamarind and tobacco and some very interesting balsamic ones. The fruity streak is a bit spent but the peach syrup and lichees are still present. The taste is excellent, centered on tannins that are dense yet still exuberant. A typical trait of wine-making at the time. The progression is good and compact with a richness that compensates for the tannins and offers a flavor that is still lively and rewarding. The finish, centered on nice evolved notes, is intense and persistent.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: not yet

title: Castello Banfi Poggio all'Oro Riserva
content: Smoky, hints of coffee and full bodied. Still has several years of life left.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Solido e deciso nel profilo principale alterna note di fragoline di bosco, terra bagnata, foglie di tè nero, salvia, alloro e bacche di ginepro. Corpo pieno, tannini ben polimerizzati ed un finale di notevole bellezza e cremosità. Bevi ora o invecchia.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Con note molto floreali si apre questo vino ricordando l'ibisco, il tiglio, il gelsomino e la canfora. Fiori di arancio e cedro impostano invece la scena secondaria. Corpo medio, tannini definiti ed un finale disteso e classico nell'amabilità .

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Leggermente surmaturo, offre sentori di prugne nere, salvia arsa, maggiorana e origano. Corpo medio, tannini rotondi ed un finale preciso e disteso.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Fragrante e leggermente offuscato offre note di gerani appassiti prugne nere e chiodi di garofano. Corpo medio, tannini poco estratti ed un finale luminoso.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: A blend of Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon, this red has alluring aromas of botanical herb, woodland berry, blue flower and a whiff of warm spice. Full bodied and loaded with finesse, the smooth, delicious palate doles out juicy raspberry, black cherry jam, tobacco and licorice before a coffee-bean finish. Fresh acidity and a backbone of firm, fine-grained tannins provide balance and structure. Drink 2022–2036. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Bright ruby with delicate garnet. On the nose clear blackcurrant, forest fruits and ripe raspberry, rich cherry. On the palate grippy with firm tannin, clear fruit, spreads across nicely, still young, long finish.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Intensives, sattes und kompaktes Rubinrot mit leuchtendem Kern. Viele dunkle Beeren in der Nase getragen von feinster Lederwürze. Am Gaumen betont saftig, wird in kürzester Zeit harsch und endet trocknend.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: A blend of 60% Merlot and 40% Cabernet Sauvignon, this has enticing aromas of black-skinned fruit, fresh violet, espresso and a whiff of cake spice. Smooth and structured, the elegant palate delivers crushed raspberry, cassis, licorice and clove that follow through to the long finish. A backbone of polished fine-grained tannins and fresh acidity give it an age-worthy structure. Drink 2019–2033.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Ripe plum, spiced blueberry, cedar, toasted oak and tobacco are some of the aromas you'll find in this structured blend ofMerlot andCabernet Sauvignon. The full-bodied palate delivers blackberries, black currants, clove, espresso, ground pepper and licorice while assertive but fine-grained tannins provide support. Drink 2016–2025.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: The 2007 Excelsus is a gorgeous super Tuscan expression (with Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot) that shows quality and superior fruit on all levels. Castello Banfi has really hit a home run with this vintage. You'll encounter persuasive aromas of cassis, blackberry, chocolate, tobacco, curry leaf and deep renderings of exotic spice. The wine's texture is exceedingly smooth, rich and long lasting.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: This vintage of this Cab-Sangiovese-Merlot blend is uniquely attractive and refined, offering a modern, direct approach and delivers pristine aromas of black cherry, blackberry, exotic spice, leather and pipe tobacco. In the mouth, it boasts thick tannins and excellent length.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Cabernet Sauvignon's green pepper aromas do arise but are delicately reigned in by the soft, yielding and plush Merlot component, which adds cherry, blackberry, spice cake and nutmeg. But what really makes this a standout wine is the texture: creamy and concentrated with solid tannins and loads of cherry flavors.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: As usual, this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot has weight and color but not a lot of richness or sweetness. The berry flavors are snappy and juicy, with tight, focused acidity. Less New World than most Banfi wines, yet for an off vintage it has its good points.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Fans of full-bodied reds should like this Cabernet/Merlot blend for its pure berry and mint aromas, its ruby luster, and dry, clean raspberry and chocolate flavors. There are full tannins now, indicating that it will age well for about five years, maybe more. And it finishes nicely.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Very supple on the palate, this Cabernet Sauvignon-Merlot blend has dense black cherry aromas and flavors framed by dill oak. Earth notes add a touch of complexity and the finish is full, with tobacco-earth accents. Attractive and easy-to-like as it is, but the wine seems to have the potential for more nuance and dimension than it presently shows.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: A fabulous Cabernet-Merlot vino da tavola from Banfi's Montalcino vineyards. It takes about an hour to open up, but once it does, wow, it's all there. Deep, cool, and delicious at the core, this really shows a new-world friendliness; it's extremely easy to drink, with its sweet blackberry and plummy character. Hedonistic stuff, and more or less ready now.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Rapisce a primo impatto ricordando note miste di Prugne nere, more, cassis, mirto selvatico, lavanda in fiore, iris, fiori di ibisco e giacinto e guaranà. Tante foglie di tè verde ed eucalipto descrivono la scena secondaria. Corpo pieno, tannini vellutati ed un finale davvero nobile e leggiadro. Un blend di 47% Merlot e 53% Cabernet Sauvignon. Meglio dal 2026.

title: Castello Banfi Excelsus Sant'Antimo
content: Smooth and inviting on the nose, with cassis and ripe plum aromas. Very modern and international, as evidenced by the blend, which is Cabernet and Merlot. Regardless, it's ripe, exotic and features tons of black fruit, coffee and chocolate. So modern and richit might be best on its own rather than with food. Drink soon.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Bright ruby red, brightening. Fragrant-spicy nose of pickled cherries, cranberries and cloves, with purple blossom in the background. The palate is savoury, with clear, juicy fruit, then, unfortunately, bitter and subdued on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Red prunes and juicy red apples are the primary scents of this young Rosso di Montalcino. Pressed red flowers, cloves and blood orange in the background. Full bodied on the palate, tannins still need taming and a long, persistent finale Drink now or hold.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Crushed herb, blue flower and new leather aromas shape the nose. On the juicy, enjoyable palate, lithe tannins and tangy acidity accompany ripe cherry, blood orange and star anise. Drink through 2024. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Leuchtendes Rubinrot. Mit mittlerem Ausdruck, etwas Vanille und Gerstenmalz, zarte Beerenfrucht. Am Gaumen harsch und weitmaschig, bleibt austrocknend über.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Intriguing in the wild profile offering notes of black prunes, blackberries, black tea leaves and camphor. Cumin and coriander describe the secondary scene which has a dark character. Medium bodied, well softened, light tannins and a pleasurable finale, juicy in every sip. Drink now.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: (2021) Banfi's Rosso is aged for around 12 months, partly in French oak barriques and partly in large Slavonian oak casks. The nose is vinous and dark, but reveals very little about the wine initially. In the mouth it is powerful and savoury, edged with bitter cherry and with a plummy character, the tannins are quite finely grained but grippy, and the classic Italianate bite of the acidity joins the finish. This could be cellared for a few years or decanted if opening now perhaps. Note Majestic may be stocking the 2019 in some stores, but their 'mix six' price is a sharp £16.99. Watch the video review for more information.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Wild berry, violet and menthol aromas are front and center on this bright young red. It's easygoing and approachable, offering juicy Marasca cherry and a hint of baking spice alongside soft tannins and vibrant acidity. Drink through 2021. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Fragrant purple-flower, black-skinned berry and wild-herb aromas lift out of the glass. On the smooth accessible palate, supple tannins lightly support juicy black cherry and licorice. Drink now. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Leuchtendes Rubin mit aufhellendem Rand. Kirsche, Himbeere, auch leicht erdigen Noten. Sauer und unausgewogen am Gaumen.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: The nose is fruity, fleshy and offers a slight richness (in the background) and a very slight minerality. It reveals notes of crunchy red fruits, fleshy blackberry and small touches of wild berries associated with hints of toasted / caramelized oak, mocha as well as a very discreet hint of sweet spices. The palate is fruity, fresh, fleshy, juicy, well-balanced and offers tension, fat, a good acid frame as well as a slight suavity. On the palate this wine expresses notes of wild strawberry, crushed redcurrant and small notes of raspberry, blackberry associated with small touches of racy minerality (terroir), olive, cherry tail as well as slight touches of toasted oak, mocha and sweet spices. Tannins are a bit tight and firm.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Strahlend klare Kirschfrucht, milder Gerbstoff auf drückend alkoholischer Grundlage, milde Säure, wirkt etwas ungelenk, trocknet im Abgang aus.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Deep garnet. Fairly subdued nose showing toast and spice touches with cherry undertones. Lively, smooth, rich palate with delicious fullness, a perfumed yet still backward mid-palate. Assertive, easy-drinking and idiosyncratic. Beautiful. Keep for a little while.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Aromas of underbrush, red berry, tilled soil and a whiff of menthol come together on this. The easygoing, vibrant palate offers black cherry, espresso and a hint of star anise alongside zesty acidity and polished tannins.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: The nose reveals notes of red fruit associated with slight notes of laurel, touches of saline minerality as well as fine notes of leather and a discreet touch of white pepper. The palate is fruity, mineral and offers a certain fluidity. In the mouth this wine expresses notes of red fruits (cherry, strawberry) and blackberry associated with slight notes of black cherry, violets as well as discreet notes of spices and blond tobacco. Tannins are fine and quite present. Good length.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Clear garnet. Subdued nose of cherry and plum with toast and vegetal notes. Straightforward, nervy palate offering up lovely honest aromatics, a hint of firmness and a fresh, vegetal finish. A nicely etched wine. A little more bottle age is recommended.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Fragrant and fresh, this opens with aromas of violets, perfumed berries and black spices. The juicy palate delivers dark cherry, crushed raspberry and cinnamon alongside supple tannins. Its easygoing nature makes it perfect for everyday enjoyment.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Here's the kind of simple Rosso di Montalcino that would pair perfectly with with risotto alla Milanese (with delicate meat flavoring and saffron) or roast pork. It's a fresh, zesty wine, with bright berry nuances and a clean, sharp mouthfeel.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Thanks to its investments in technology, Castello Banfi reliably delivers quality, especially when it comes to Sangiovese. This food-friendly expression shows bright but easy flavors of forest fruit and sour cherry.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Castello Banfi's bright and fruit-forward Rosso di Montalcino would make a perfect match to grilled lamb chops or roast pork. The wine is simple and genuine yet the freshness of the fruit—with cherry, blackberry and raspberry overtones—makes it easy and fun to drink.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: (2002) Nose of sweet, ripe, dark brown sugar and chocolate-coated cherry and blackcurrant fruit. Hints of pleasant mushroomy notes. The palate has broad, soft, juicy black fruit and tart cherry skins with ripe tannins and good balance.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: This is a large-scaled rosso, and oak is used here lavishly but gracefully. Aromas of game, leather, and dill open to dark plum and licorice flavors and a dense feel on the palate. Moderate tannins show up on the long finish, accompnaied by lots of toasty oak and licorice notes.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: (2001) Overripe, sweet, jammy almost confected lushness of fruit. Impressive. Big dry tannins coat the mouth, then a cherry fruit and cherry acidity kicks through, little nuances of herbs, game and tobacco. A bit disjointed at present, but plenty to it, and could improve over a few years.

title: Castello Banfi Rosso di Montalcino
content: Intrigante e decisamente coinvolgente al naso mostra note di fragoline di bosco, susine, fiori di agapanto e violetta selvatica. Giacinto e guaranà descrivono la scena secondaria. Corpo medio-pieno, tannini ben polimerizzati ed un finale gustoso che chiede il ritorno al calice. Bevi ora.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Currants, raspberries and wild strawberries are the primary scents in this young Chianti Classico. Medium bodied, light tannins and a finale of medium length. Drink now.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Aufhellendes Rubinrot. In der Nase rote Johannisbeeren, Geranien und etwas Pfefferwürze. Am Gaumen von mittlerem Gewicht, zeigt rotbeerigen Fruchtkern, endet im Finale dann etwas austrocknend.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Würzige Beerenaromatik, Noten von Pfeffer und mediterraner Macchia; geschliffen im Mund, die Säure belebend, das Finale kraftvoll und würzig.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Cola, caramello dolce, caffè tostato e mile millefiori sono i sentori singolari che si celano in questa Riserva precisa ed essenziale nel profilo principale. Corpo medio, tannini leggermente secchi ed un finale magro di buona freschezza. Bevi ora.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Violet, wild berry and botanical herb aromas shape the alluring nose on this straightforward, enjoyable red. On the smooth palate, polished tannins accompany ripe Morello cherry, star anise and a sprinkle of white pepper. Drink through 2022. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Bright ruby. Open nose of ripe raspberry and strawberries with cream, fragrant. On the palate very fresh and gluggable, medium body, flows gently, uncomplicated and straightforward.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Sentori caldi e vividi di prugna rossa, mirtilli e pietra focaia. Corpo medio-pieno, tannino soffice e ben maturo ed un finale equilibrato.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Sattes, leuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase Kompakt nach satten Himbeeren, Kirschen, Veilchen und getrockneten Rosenblättern. Am Gaumen saftig und klar mit fruchtbetontem Kern, hat gewisse Eleganz, breitet sich gut aus, endet im Finale dann leicht trocknend.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: The nose is fruity. It reveals notes of cassis, dark chocolate / cocoa and crushed blackberry combined with small touches of wild red berries as well as discreet hints of caramelized oak and a very discreet hint of sweet spices. The palate is fruity, soft, silky, well-balanced and offers juiciness, gourmandise, a fine acid frame, minerality, a small roundness, a good freshness and tension. On the palate this wine expresses notes of crushed cassis, crushed blackberry and plum associated with small notes of black cherry, jammy strawberry, crushed red berries as well as fine touches of liquorice, colas, small touches of wood, chocolate and a discreet hint of garrigue. Good length.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Truffle, new leather, ripe blackberry and toasted aromas are front and center. The straightforward light-bodied palate offers tart cherry, pomegranate, clove and a hint of espresso alongside close-grained tannins and vibrant acidity. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Made from a blend ofSangioveseCanaiolo andCabernet Sauvignon, this starts with heady aromas of violet, iris and red berries. The bright palate offers sour cherry and raspberry accented with a note of thyme, coffee and hints of bell pepper. Not an ager so enjoy soon.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: A blend ofSangioveseCanaiolo andCabernet Sauvignon, this starts with aromas of red berry, blue flower and spice. The juicy palate serves up black cherry and cinnamon-spice along with notes of espresso. It's soft and one-dimensional but delicious none the less.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Banfi presents an easy, no-fuss Chianti Classico that showcases Sangiovese typicity and personality. This is a profoundly food-friendly wine with built-in natural acidity that pairs it with butter or cream-based pasta dishes.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Banfi's Chianti Classico Riserva is easy to drink thanks to its bright flavors of wild berry, almond, cola and blue flower. It's a medium-bodied wine with cooling freshness that would pair well with white meat, ham or stuffed pasta like ravioli or lasagna.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: A nice, soft Riserva from a difficult vintage that exhibits resin notes, pine nut, some mineral intensity, cherry flavors and dusty tannins. You'll get a chalky, velvety feel in the mouth.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: A fair amount of sweet character comes off the nose, primarily chocolate, berry jam and sugar beet. In the mouth, there's additional milk chocolate alongside dried fruit, herbs and a hint of citrus. Finishes solid but with starchy tannins. There's also some marshmallow sweetness to the aftertaste.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Tobacco and herb accents play off cherry fruit on the slightly muted nose of this medium-weight wine. Plum, chocolate and wood flavors mark the slightly lean palate. Finishes dry, with cocoa and tea notes.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Toasted wheat bread, bacon and clove add interest to the nose, which is robust and loaded with black fruit. The palate is complex enough to trigger some intrigue: Cinnamon, butter and licorice support the dark fruit nicely. The finish is smoothly textured, and there's an airy quality to it. Quite meaty and solid, with a firm core. —M.S.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: A nice, smooth Chianti.

content: good

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Giadas smooth w/lemon backside. But no WOW factor

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG
content: Really nice take wine, must let breathe at least an hour.  Pasta red sauce a nice compliment.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico Riserva DOCG

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: Dunkelleuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase feine Frucht nach Kirschen und Brombeeren, zeigt Nuancen von getrocknetem Rosenblatt und gedörrter Blutorange. Am Gaumen saftig und mit eng gewobenem Tannin, zeigt auch feinen Druck, in sich stimmig, viel Wein für gutes Geld.

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: Fruchtig-würziges Boquuet mit Noten von Sauerkirsche, Grapefruit, eingelegten Pflaumen, etwas Kakao und Pfeffer. Am Gaumen mittelgewichtig, weihnachtliche Gewürze, Zitrus, Brombeere. Rundes Tannin, mittellang im Abgang.

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: Aromas of ripe dark fruit and baking spice lead the way on this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Sangiovese and Merlot. The juicy, straightforward palate offers dried black cherry and hints of star anise alongside pliant tannins. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: Riecht nach Kirsche und Dörrbohnen, unreifer Cabernet. Am Gaumen mit leichter Holzprägung, glattem Tannin und einer deutlich süßen Frucht hinter Grüntönen. Ulrich Sautter

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: Easy, chewy, slightly bitter and plush, Centine is an everyday red wine that offers nostalgic hints of sunny Tuscany. Bold cherry flavors make it a good match to pizza and pasta.

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: Chewy, ripe fruit and jammy cherry aromas are backed by subtle hints of dried herb and rosemary. Pair this easy wine with grilled hamburgers or spicy barbecued pork ribs.

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: Polished stone, mineral and milky blueberry tones make up the dense fabric of this well-concentrated blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot. Banfi's Centine is inky and dark in appearance and offers aromas of raw fruit and Indian spice. The mouthfeel is chewy and soft.

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: Fresh, clean and approachable, this wine offers simple linearity in terms of structure and concentration but holds its own in terms of aromas. Buried within are notes of ripe cherry, forest floor and white mushroom.

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: This trattoria wine has it going on. The nose offers bacon and smoke at first, and then lots of red berry fruit and a bit of light wood. Snappy red fruit dominates the palate, while the zesty finish is lean and tight, with freshness and length. Great for pastas and pizza.

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: A succulent, chewy Sangiovese, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon blend with a pretty ruby color and intense aromas of coffee, tar, leather and toasted wood. The tannins are still a bit raw and beg for hearty meat. Tightly packed cherry and blackberry linger over a long finish. Castello Banfi performs the extraordinary vintage after vintage: It's almost a one million case per year winery and it continues to offer excellent quality on its lowest priced products.

title: Castello Banfi Centine Toscana IGT
content: A good little blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet and Merlot, probably best for a lunchtime pasta or pizza in the evening. The body is plump and sweet, with candied fruit. Firm on the palate, but maybe a tad too sugary.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Open and radiant in the glass offering notes of raspberries, currants, cherries, lemon peel and guaranà. Full bodied, rounded tannins and a really tasty, savoury finale. Drink now.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Made predominantly with Sangiovese, this has pretty aromas of wild berries and violet. Light-bodied and easygoing, the palate offers juicy strawberry, tart cherry and a hint of spice alongside pliant tannins. Drink now. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Leuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase von mittlerem Ausdruck, zart nach Erdbeeren und Butterkeksen, im Nachklang nach roter Paprika und weißem Pfeffer. Am Gaumen kompakt, mit klarer Frucht und zart wahrnehmbarem Tannin, in Ansatz und Verlauf saftig.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Open on the nose showing notes of strawberries, red plums and lemon rind blended with hints of white stone dust. Medium bodied, rounded tannins with no edges and a classic finale, a little austere, distended and harmonic. Drink now or hold.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Wow! Sentori chiari e vivi di fragole, ciliegia, mandorle e succo di arancia. Corpo medio pieno, tannino soffice e poco estratto e finale caldo ed avvolgente. Bevi ora o invecchia.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Leuchtend Rubin. In der Nase etwas verschlossen, zarte Waldfrüchte. Am Gaumen saftig mit leicht griffigem Tannin, mittlere Länge, im Nachhall weitmaschig.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Leuchtendes Rubinrot mit funkelndem Kern. In der Nase nach reifen Himbeeren, getrockneten Tomaten und leichte Töne vom Rauch. Am Gaumen ausgewogen und fruchtsüß, schöne Balance, endet im Finale saftig und klar.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Juicy and easygoing, this simple red offers flavors suggesting ripe dark-skinned berry and hints of culinary spice. It's round and ready, with soft tannins. Drink soon. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Bright berry fruit and a thin, crisp finish characterize this easy-drinking Chianti Classico. It delivers bright aromas of violet, raspberry and forest bramble.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Made fromSangiovese andother red grapes, this pretty wine has a bright fragrance of red berries and a hint of violet. The straightforward palate offers sour cherry and hints of cinnamon spice. Simple but well made, it's thoroughly enjoyable and will work well with everyday fare, from pizza to barbecued meats.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: This young wine has aromas of violet and forest floor, while the palate reveals ripe strawberry and cherry flavors. Forward, easygoing and approachable now, so enjoy soon.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: From the heart of Tuscany's best winemaking zone, this ruby-red wine delivers red fruit, cherry, almond skin and light spice. It's simple, fresh and clean.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Here is a very attractive Chianti Classico from Banfi (of Brunello di Montalcino fame) with a rich bouquet of cherry, wild berry and exotic spice. It is a delicate wine with background shadings of Spanish cedar and root beer that linger on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: (2006) Castello Banfi's 2003 is a blend of 90 per cent Sangiovese with 10 per cent of Canaiolo/Colorino. It spends a relatively short three months in Slavonian oak, but the initial impression on the nose is of spicy, cedary, tobacco and toast, though a fine, pure, cherry-fruited concentration begins to show throw. On the palate there's a slightly raw edge to this wine, but it has good fruit and a creamy ripeness in the mouth, with soft, generous tannin structure and just enough acidity to balance.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: A basic wine that's in proportion. The bouquet offers bacon, menthol and rubber along with nuances of espresso and modest complexity. Boysenberry and blackberry flavors carry notes of cinnamon and vanilla, while the feel is soft yet substantive. Not a thriller, but eminently drinkable.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: (2002) A lovely warmth of briarwood and tobacco on the nose over cherry fruit. Lots of crisp acidity on the palate, with keen-edged cherries and a light-bodied juiciness. Savoury, with elegant length, this is a modern but restrained style that is solid, but doesn't really excite.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: (2001) Lots of creamy, ripe fruit here thats much more direct and lush, plenty of blackcurrant and black cherry, hints of chocolate and rich, sweet plum. Lovely drinking too, with graceful tannins and good fruit. Very easy to drink, but classy.

title: Castello Banfi Chianti Classico DOCG
content: Frutti blu come mirtilli selvatici e ribes neri invadono la scena primaria. Cioccolato fondente, noci tostate e chicchi di caffè sono i protagonisti del profilo secondario. Al palato, corpo pieno, tannini da addomesticare ed un finale leggermente vuoto dal centro palato in poi. Meglio dal 2025.

content: Fantastic! Complex, yet smooth.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Bright ruby red. After candle wax, precious wood, rubbed blackberries and cassis on the nose, sealing wax, undergrowth. On the palate a slight wood overhang and tight earthy tannin, dark core and course, seems very extracted, n the finish then unfortunately some drying wood tannin.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Open and decidedly intriguing in the primary profile alternating notes of raspberries, currants, wild myrtle, guaranà, withered linden blossom, lemon juice, pomegranate, white pepper and cut grass. Full bodied, well polymerized tannins and a finale that lengthens gracefully although a little slim. Better from 2025.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Aromas of underbrush, toasted nut, violet and eucalyptus mingle with a whiff of tobacco. The tobacco note follows through to the full-bodied, velvety palate, along with prune, dried cherry and licorice. Taut, fine-grained tannins provide support. Drink 2024–2031. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Dunkel leuchtendes Rubinrot. In der Nase satte Beerenfrucht nach Waldbeeren und Brombeeren, ein Hauch Blutorange, dunkles Leder, im Nachhall nach Unterholz und satter Würze. Öffnet sich am Gaumen mit sattem, kraftvollem Tannin, viel reife Waldbeerfrucht im Kern, noch jung, wird sehr gut reifen.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Extremely fascinating showing notes of calendula, gorse, linden blossom, camphor and cut cedar. There's more in the background with the alternation between walnut husks, green tea leaves and rosemary which in a subtle yet essential way give a mediterranean imprint to the matrix. Medium to full bodied, tannins rigid at the moment which show tension and a grumpy character and a tight finale of impressive length. A wine projected to age over time, it will need a long time to truly come out with all of its expressitivity. Better from 2025.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Aromas of underbrush, leather and tobacco form the nose along with whiffs of oak-driven spice. Full bodied and linear, the palate features dried cherry, roasted coffee bean, spearmint and licorice alongside tightly knit, close-grained tannins that clench the finish. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Dark ruby with garnet. On the nose rich cherries, wild berry jam, a breath of bitter chocolate, noble wood. On the palate amazingly fresh, with clear fruit, stretches out with a great fan, also tense, with drive, coherent in itself, long finish.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Solid and centred offering scents of wet geraniums, hot asphalt, crushed leaves, cut ginger and dog rose. Impressive secondary factors in the background give notes of crushed oranges, white pepper and juniper berries. Medium to full bodied, slightly rigid tannins at the moment which will distend over time and a tight, vibrant finale that lasts forever is its main weapon. Better from 2022.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Amarene, nocciola e noci tritate in questa Riserva 2013. Corpo pieno, tannino morbido e finale semplice. Bevi ora.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Klare Frucht-Veilchenaromatik; kompakter Bau mit rassigen Tanninen, hat Kraft und Länge bis ins dezent vom Holz unterstützte Finale. Macht Spass.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Aromas of pipe tobacco, ripe plum, underbrush and a whiff of new leather lead the way on this firmly structured red. The full-bodied palate shows raspberry compote, tart cranberry, star anise, sage and espresso alongside tight close-grained tannins that give the finish grip. Drink 2021–2030. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Tiefdunkles Rubinrot. Dunkelbeerige Nase nach satter Cassis und reifen Holunderbeeren, dann Kaffeesatz und malzige Aromen. Am Gaumen satt und dunkelbeerig, öffnet sich auf weitmaschigem Tannin, trocknend, im Finale harsch.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Underbrush, pipe tobacco, leather, scorched earth and dark culinary-spice aromas meld together in this full-bodied red. The savory, structured palate delivers baked plum, juicy black cherry, vanilla and star anise framed in fine-grained tannins. Drink 2020–2032.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Aromas suggesting ripe plum, exotic spice, blue flower and a whiff of pipe tobacco take shape in the glass. The full-bodied palate doles out ripe black cherry, raspberry, vanilla and a hint of star anise while velvety tannins give it a polished feel. An espresso note signals the close. Drink 2018–2026.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Frisches Beerenbouquet, auch feine kräuterwürzige Noten, spürbare Sandelholznoten; im Mund kompakt, kernig, Tannine und die Säure sind balanciert, frisches Fruchtfinale. Für Freunde des modernen Brunello-Stils.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Dark garnet with bricking. Captivating nose of mild spices, dried vegetal, tobacco and a touch of coffee. Velvety, concentrated, profound and powerful palate with magnificent aromas recalling the nose. Faint firmness still yet very harmonious. A superlative wine.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: The nose is still a bit shy but eventually reveals underbrush, ripe plum and whiff of dark spice. The firmly structured palate delivers mature black cherry, clove, licorice and a hint of tobacco framed in densely packed, fine-grained tannins that need to unwind. Drink 2020–2030.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: The nose is fine, elegant and aromatic. It reveals notes of blackberry and cherry liqueur associated with fine notes of mocha, sweet spices and slight notes of tobacco. The palate is fruity, mineral and offers elegance, tension and a beautiful dense, fleshy and silky matter. In the mouth this wine expresses notes of blackberry, cherry cream and slight notes of black cherry associated with touches of licorice and dark chocolate. Tannins are fine, slightly dry and quite present. Good length and persistence. A nice wine!

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Garnet just starting to change colour. Mature nose of morello cherry, mocha, mild spices, herbs and subtle exotic wood. Soft attack, delicious, silky, robust palate generously releasing aroma. Firm finish. Splendid. Still an adolescent wine.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: This firmly structured wine opens with toasted aromas, baked plum, fennel and a licorice note. The palate offers dried cherry, fig, roasted coffee bean and anisette alongside bracing tannins. Drink through 2020.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Schwarzkirscharomatik, Noten von Nougat und Tabak, das Holz noch präsent. Stoffige Textur, satt und dicht, besitzt viel Fülle und Rasse und frisches Tannin, endet fruchtbetont auf Noten von Waldbeerconfit und Lakritze. Rassiger moderner Wein mit komplexer Struktur.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: This structured wine opens with aromas that recall underbrush, blue flower, mature black plums, balsam and a whiff of leather. The palate delivers black cherry sweetened with vanilla, toasted oak, espresso and chocolate alongside bracing tannins. Drink 2015–2020.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Riserva Poggio alle Mura really delivers the goods with a dark garnet appearance and huge aromatic intensity that comes forth as dried fruit, cassis, prune, cola, ginger, cedar and licorice. The wine shows complexity and balance with endnotes of sweet spice and dark berry. This is a rich, plush and velvety Brunello that will be ready to drink in just a few brief years.

title: Castello Banfi Poggio alle Mura Riserva
content: Excelente vino, excelente añada!!!

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Succoso e ben dinamico nel profilo sensoriale alterna note di ciliegie, buccia di limone, fiori di acacia e petali di rosa. Corpo medio, tannini soffici di grana fine ed un finale integro e deciso che chiede di tronare al calice. Ottima espressione made in Montalcino. Bevi ora.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Aromas of black-skinned berry, sandalwood and mocha shape the nose on this medium-bodied red. A blend of Sangiovese, Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Syrah, the savory palate offers dried black cherry, tobacco and espresso alongside polished tannins. Kerin O’Keefe

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Bright ruby red. Shows on the nose beautiful nuances of red berry, caramel sweets in the background. On the palate fine cassis, shows nice spice, compact tannin, balanced.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: In der Nase dunkle Frucht und würzige Anklänge. Reife Pflaume, Cassis und dunkel gebackene Brotkruste. Am Gaumen straffe, dichte Struktur, elegant, mit reifer Beerenfrucht, reifem Tannin und langem Abgang. Benjamin Herzog, Dominik Vombach

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Intensives, grünlich-würziges Bouquet mit Johannisbeerblättern, roten und dunklen Beeren, sowie Pfeffer und Lakritze. Am Gaumen feine Beerenfrucht, angenehm präsente Säure und spürbares Tannin. Alles in allem ein frischer, unkomplizierter Roter mit Substanz.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: A blend consisting of 30% Cabernet Sauvignon, 30% Merlot, 25% Sangiovese, 15% Syrah, this has aromas of black currant, pipe tobacco and a whiff of purple flower. Vibrant and elegant, the medium-bodied palate offers succulent blackberry, crunchy red cherry, clove and star anise alongside polished, fine-grained tannins.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Schokolade, Rauch, getrocknete Tomaten und Oliven. Freilich fehlt auch die Frucht nicht, die sehr reif, fast gedörrt daherkommt. Vehementer Gerbstoffteppich und üppige Extraktsüße sorgen für Textur und einen wärmenden Nachhall. Die Summe aller Teile ergibt einen mächtigen Rotwein.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: This blend of Cabernet, Merlot and Syrah shows a decadently soft side thanks to its aromas of black cherry, tobacco, chocolate and subtle spice. It delivers density and substance on the finish and would pair with pasta and creamy porcini sauce.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Cum Laude is a dark and sophisticated blend of Sangiovese with Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot and Syrah that boasts amazing intensity and purity of flavors. There's blackberry, cassis, cherry liqueur, smoked bacon, black pepper and soft tobacco. It's soft, velvety and persistent on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Castello Banfi's delicious Cum Laude is a super Tuscan blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Sangiovese and Syrah that opens with rich aromas of black fruit and chocolate fudge. TheCabernet Sauvignon component adds background notes of exotic spice, moist tobacco and firm tannins.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: A food-friendly blend of Cabernet Sauvignon, Merlot, Sangiovese and Syrah, Cum Laude offers attractive notes of milk chocolate and creamy cherry over a rich, plump mouthfeel. Meat dishes or pasta al forno with a crunchy cheese topping would fit the bill.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Cabernet, Merlot, Sangiovese and Syrah produce a sophisticated and refined blend that boasts fantastic power and intensity. The wine is dark, chewy, rich and bursting with flavors of mature berry, spice, cola, leather and tobacco.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: This is a new kitchen-sink offering from Banfi, featuring Cabernet, Merlot, Sangiovese and Syrah. It goes full bore on the red fruit and oak, with spicy berry aromas and cherry flavors. The tannins are pretty hard, and with ample acids, this young wine currently starches the cheeks. But in three years it should become a good to very good table wine.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Quite candied, with aromas of red licorice, cassis and boysenberry syrup. A true berry ball, with forward fruit, a sweet and easy finish, and mild tannins. Laudable for its zippy qualities, but could use more structure.

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: Everything you expect out of this style from Italy. The age made it perfect as well

title: Castello Banfi 'Cum Laude' Sant'Antimo
content: 88 Punkte. Gute Nase schwacher Körper. Sollte dekantiert werden. Es gibt bessere Alternativen

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (2021) The name of this wine translates to 'Stony Hill', the grapes coming from the rockiest slopes on the Banfi estate in Tuscany. Currants and fresh red berries on the nose, little oak influence if any, just a touch of dusty green olive from the Cabernet component. Plenty of cherry-ripe sweetness on the palate, blackberries too, combining some fruit depth with fresher, lightly herbal notes. Plenty of creamy sweetness here with a sour tang of orange to the acidity.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (2019) A blend of 70% Cabernet Sauvignon and 30% Sangiovese, this is a perfumed and very pleasing red, a touch of herbs and graphite, the ripeness of black Cabernet fruit, and the tangy vibrancy of Sangiovese cherries all present and correct. In the mouth there is a sweet and creamy edge to this, substantial but with a creamy softness to the tannins and acidity that give it enough structure while leaving it pizza and spag-bol friendly.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: Im der Nase schöne Fruchtnoten mit Kirsche und Pflaume, dazu florale und würzige Anklänge. Am Gaumen rund, schmeichelnd und trinkig. Benjamin Herzog & Dominik Vombach

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: Kirsche, Cassis, im Duft reintönig und klar. Am Gaumen mit viel Saft und einer ausgewogenen Struktur, eher mild im Tannin, ein angenehmer Tischwein zu Antipasti (z.?B. grilliertem Gemüse). Ulrich Sautter

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: A blend of Sangiovese and Cabernet Sauvignon, this opens with cherry cola, sweet fruit, spice and dried rosemary aromas. It is easy-drinking and bright, with a touch of fruity sweetness on the finish.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: Not a bad entry-level Tuscan red; it shows sweet bubble gum and LifeSaver aromas with just enough darkness to make it nice. Very young and cheeky in the mouth, meaning it's kind of hard, tannic and scratchy. But it's also fully ripe, thus with pizza or spaghetti it won't hurt at all.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (2001) Jammy, sweet, blackcurranty nose that is ripe and lush. Theres a nice zing of acidity running through the palate, very cherryish but theres a dark, more dusty black fruit too. Good mouthfeel and nice balance giving good length. Very good - a 50/50 Sangiovese/Cabernet Sauvignon blend.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (2000) Rich, sweet berry and cherry fruit on the nose, little notes of soft brown sugar. Firm, tight and juicy palate. Good fruit and structure at the price.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: (1999) Ruby/cherry red. Bright. Subdued but attractive nose with zippy cherry and raspberry fruit and sweet vanillin. Savoury on the palate. Good sour-cherry fruit and more sweet oak, with firm tannins and prominent lemon acidity. Creamy consistency. Finish is quite long, but full of drying tannins.

title: Castello Banfi Banfi Col di Sasso Toscana IGT
content: Purple in the middle and light on the edges. A candied, sweet, simple red with plum, raisin and chocolate flavors. Bold and basic.
